Windy City Gyros Posted by Anonymous on 09/10/2011
Great Late Night Spot
I have bern going there for years, and I always get the ribs tips. I simply love them. They are quick when you want your food. Windy City Gyros Posted by Miss KP on 04/05/2011
Great greek chicken!
I've been visiting Windy city for years and almost always order a whole Greek chicken. This is the best Greek chicken that I've had in Chicago. It costs about $12.00, a good value for the amount of food you get. I usually call ahead so I don't have to wait around for my order. They do have decent seating if you want to eat right there. Windy City Gyros Posted by Fooddog on 03/19/2008
Awesome food for what it is!
The review according to me: I got the double cheese burg with everything and a chili cheese dog w/fries. The burger was very solid. The dog was T.A.S.T.Y. the fries were average at best. I called ahead to have it picked up at 9:30. I walked in at 9:29 and the man was wrapping up the burger as I entered. Talk about good timing! This place is great for a greasy end of a bar night, or just watching the game style meal. The inside is comfortable but could benefit from some music of any kind. The prices are very reasonable. Overall I would give it 3.75 stars out of 5. Windy City Gyros Posted by Pancho on 02/19/2007
Crazy spot
This is a Chicago food joint to the max. Where else can cops, bootleggers, hookers and us simple folk come together and enjoy fast food in the city? This place definitly has character. Pita Chicken with a side of Feta cheese. Open late as hell.
